summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6075 for the improvement of THISTLE STREET from 48th Avenue South on the south to 50th Avenue South on the south; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83380, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
